subject: Suits and Litigation
Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
Accidents and Safety
Olympic Games
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The parents of a 17-year-old girl who died in a fall while competing in the Olympic equestrian sport of eventing have sued the sport’s governing body, her former trainer and others.
snippet: The parents of a 17-year-old girl who died in a fall while competing in the Olympic equestrian sport of eventing have sued the sport’s governing body, her former trainer and others.
